tagline.title: BALI NORTH WATERFALL TOUR IS FULL DAY TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY VISITING BEAUTIFUL WATERFALL IN NORTHERN PART OF BALI ISLANDS
tagline.text: BALI NORTH WATERFALL TOUR IS FULL DAY TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY VISITING BEAUTIFUL WATERFALL IN NORTHERN PART OF BALI ISLANDS
tagline.html: BALI NORTH WATERFALL TOUR IS FULL DAY TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY VISITING BEAUTIFUL WATERFALL IN NORTHERN PART OF BALI ISLANDS

description.text: Bali North Waterfall Tour is an Bali Full Day Tour Packages to enjoy visiting a waterfall tourist destination in the northern area of the island of Bali which is very famous for its natural beauty which is still very natural with green views from the trees makes the visit even more enjoyable. If you are a waterfall lover and have good stamina, you can choose this tour, apart from being able to exercise trekking to the location, you can enjoy the beauty of the surrounding nature and the wonder of the waterfall. First, our tour driver will pick you up in the morning and head to the first tourist destination, namely Banyumala Twin Waterfall, which is a very beautiful waterfall tourist destination with the uniqueness of two water flows in the waterfall which is often called Twin Waterfall, then continue to Munduk Waterfall, which is a water tourist destination. The waterfall in the north is very beautiful, just like other waterfalls the view is still natural and very beautiful, continue to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with Indonesian food, after lunch the journey continues to Leke - Leke Waterfall to see and admire the natural beauty a waterfall that is still very natural clear water and cool weather will make the trip not feel tired. After that, we will take you to your hotel where you will stay with a very impressive experience on a one day tour to a waterfall in the northern area of the island of Bali. With an experienced and friendly driver this will make this trip even more enjoyable. If you want to swim in the waterfall pool, you are expected to bring a change of clothes and a towel, because we do not provide these

title.title: Bali North Waterfall Tour | Banyumala Twin Waterfall

image.title: Bali North Waterfall Tour | Banyumala Twin Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Banyumala Twin Waterfall is first site we will visit during Bali North Waterfall Tour, is one of the waterfall tourist destinations in the north which is very famous for its natural beauty around it which makes it feel like a natural forest, and with its uniqueness in that there are two streams of water in the waterfall which are often called Twin Waterfalls. The height is not that high, namely only about 20 meters with clear water that comes from mountain springs, there is a water pool that can accommodate many people in the pool, and one of the waterfalls is very suitable for soaking with clear water directly from the mountains. The green scenery around adds to the beauty of this waterfall. You also need very good stamina because you will need to walk around 30 - 45 minutes to reach this waterfall from the parking area.
description.html: Banyumala Twin Waterfall is first site we will visit during Bali North Waterfall Tour, is one of the waterfall tourist destinations in the north which is very famous for its natural beauty around it which makes it feel like a natural forest, and with its uniqueness in that there are two streams of water in the waterfall which are often called Twin Waterfalls. The height is not that high, namely only about 20 meters with clear water that comes from mountain springs, there is a water pool that can accommodate many people in the pool, and one of the waterfalls is very suitable for soaking with clear water directly from the mountains. The green scenery around adds to the beauty of this waterfall. You also need very good stamina because you will need to walk around 30 - 45 minutes to reach this waterfall from the parking area.

title.title: Munduk Waterfall | Bali North Waterfall Tour

image.title: Bali North Waterfall Tour | Munduk Waterfall | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Munduk Waterfall is second site we will visit during Bali North Waterfall Tour, is one of the waterfalls that is very famous among tourists, with the same location still natural with lots of green trees around the waterfall and along the road to the location, creating an atmosphere like in an unspoiled forest with cool weather that will create an atmosphere visiting is very enjoyable. The height of Munduk waterfall is not that high, only around 20 meters, but it offers a very beautiful view. The sound of water falling from above to the pool of water under the waterfall completes the beautiful scenery. The pool in the waterfall, which falls from above, is classified as not large, which is only enough for bathing, You need good stamina because to get to the location you will walk for at least 30 - 45 minutes to reach location

title.title: Leke - Leke Waterfall | Bali North Waterfall Tour

image.title: Leke - Leke Waterfall | Bali North Waterfall Tour| Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Leke - Leke Waterfall is third site we will visit during Bali North Waterfall Tour, Leke - Leke Waterfall is a waterfall tourist destination that is very popular among tourists with an unspoiled location with lots of plants around the waterfall making this place very cool and natural, like most waterfalls to get to the location you will walk a path to get to it. the location of the waterfall, along the road you can enjoy very beautiful views. The height of the Leke - Leke waterfall is around 32 meters with spring water that comes from mountain springs which are still clear and clean and definitely free from pollution. Under the waterfall there is a water storage pool that you can use to swim in the waterfall. This, with cold water, will make you feel like you are in an unspoiled village with cool atmosphere.
description.html: Leke - Leke Waterfall is third site we will visit during Bali North Waterfall Tour, Leke - Leke Waterfall is a waterfall tourist destination that is very popular among tourists with an unspoiled location with lots of plants around the waterfall making this place very cool and natural, like most waterfalls to get to the location you will walk a path to get to it. the location of the waterfall, along the road you can enjoy very beautiful views. price.title: Bali North Waterfall Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali North Waterfall Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour (no sharing), We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of North Bali Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 650,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 700,000/person
Note : Minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Banyumala Twin Waterfall
Visit Leke - Leke Waterfall

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
